alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Mason; Peoria; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 4:28PM CDT until April 20 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Woodford County in central Illinois... Southeastern Fulton County in west central Illinois... Tazewell County in central Illinois... Northeastern Mason County in central Illinois... Southern Peoria County in central Illinois... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 428 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Canton to Lewistown, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Hanna City around 445 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include West Peoria, Bellevue, Glasford, Peoria, Bartonville, Creve Coeur, Germantown Hills, Spring Bay and Bay View Gardens. This includes the following highways... Interstate 155 between mile markers 23 and 31. Interstate 474 between mile markers 0 and 14. Interstate 74 between mile markers 85 and 110. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and west central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and west central Illinois.
